name: gendered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or for people of one particular gender (= males, females, or other identities), or affected by gender: The gendered nature of the offshore oil and gas industry means workers tend to be male. The article deals with the gendered portrayal of home life in films. Opposite
ungendered
More examplesFewer examplesMany women remain burdened with gendered responsibilities in their families.Language had evolved to be different: fewer gendered pronouns, for example.I did not consider the term "career progression" to be gendered when I began.
